title: Castle.Story.Prototype.v.0.1.0.a8c9.MacOSX-RAiN
description:
Castle Story is a voxel-based creative strategy game about building castles brick by brick and defending them against enemies.
Castle Story is a creative voxel-based strategy game in which you can build castles one brick at a time using an army of little characters called "Bricktrons".

Your goal will be to explore a vast landscape full of mysteries and dangers, and defend your castle against onslaughts of hostile creatures and perhaps even other players.
